name: Bombakereso
overview: Bombakereső - A new MineSweeper for the C64! I'm sure many of you have heard of MineSweeper; a puzzle game in which players had to clear the board of numbers without coming across deadly exploding bombs, using help from clues about the number of neighbouring mines in each field. But I bet you haven't heard of Bombakereső, which is the latest C64 game to be developed by Krissz! It features a definable play size and difficulty levels and a space theme to make it nicely atmosphereic.
